text:
Excitement and Anticipation

A cozy room, two friends chatting.  
Dounia can’t wait to see you!  
Friend: “When is the ceremony?”  
Dounia: “Soon! Pyotr is eager!”  

---

A joyful mood, Dounia daydreams.  
Dounia: “I’d marry him just for this!”  
Friend: “You’re an angel!”  

---

A serious tone, calculating expenses.  
Friend: “I’ll send money soon.”  
Dounia: “What about travel costs?”  
Friend: “We’ll manage; Pyotr helps!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Dounia is excited about her upcoming marriage to Pyotr Petrovitch, and they are planning their journey to Petersburg while managing their finances.
